entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
